title: Clever one liners to deal with toxic players
body:
Feel free to post your witty one liners that you use when dealing with toxic players.

Here are a few of my favorite ones:

Good thing i brought my hazmat suit cause you are toxic
Have you been listening to Britney Spears?   Don't you know that your toxic
(Insert their GT here) used toxic.... it was very effective (insert your GT) was badly poisoned
You should be playing singed because then your toxic shit would actually help our team

replies.body: (When two people are fighting) Girls, girls.... You're BOTH pretty.
Just be rammus and say OK
your mother....my reply to every negative comment thrown at me....shuts them up right away.
